Specializing in Handcrafted American made birdbaths and pottery, Burley has been around since 1923. We moved from Maysville Pike in South Zanesville to Roseville, Ohio in the old abandoned Nelson McCoy factory in 2001 and we continue to keep the lost art of pottery alive.
